titles.title: 285 Where Jesus Is, 'Tis Heaven (nice, a little wo

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Since Christ my soul
From sin set free
This world has been
A heav'n to me
And mid earth's sorrows
And its woe
'Tis heav'n my Jesus
Here to know

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Oh hallellujah
Yes 'tis heaven
'Tis heaven to know
My sins forgiv'n
On land or sea
What matters where
Where Jesus is
'Tis heaven there

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Once heaven seemed
A far off place
Till Jesus showed
His smiling face
Now it's begun
Within my soul
'Twill last while endless
Ages roll

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
What matters where
On earth we dwell
On mountaintop
Or in the dell
In cottage or
A mansion fair
Where Jesus is
'Tis heaven there
